CustomField.description:
When this setting is enabled, the Objectives tab is not included in account plans of this type, and objectives can’t be included in a Powerpoint export of one of these plans.
When this setting is disabled, the Objectives tab is included in account plans of this type, and objectives can be included in a Powerpoint export as long as the AM Add Plan Details setting is enabled in Dealmaker Powerpoint custom settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled, the Objectives tab is not in these plans, and objectives can’t be in a Powerpoint export. When disabled, the tab is included, and objectives can be exported if AM Add Objectives is enabled in Powerpoint custom settings.
CustomField.label: Disable Objectives
